name: argilla/FinePersonas-v0.1-clustering-100k
description:
Dataset Card for PersonaHub FineWeb-Edu 4 Clustering 100k
	

This dataset has been created with distilabel.
The following figure is a map of the clusters generated from the pipeline. It's automatically generated by the TextClustering with all the information gathered.
It contains 177 different clusters, which were assigned a set of 3 labels each, and the black dots correspond to those unclassified examples.
